title: Dark Star Thresh
body:
Everyone's reporting bugs and what not and i'm about to ask a real question too that seems to be missed and be down voted for it because that's what this AIDS community does whenever I ask real questions. 

Since Thresh is disabled, he's deal AND separate skin is disabled as a whole too, whats going to occur with the sale? It was available for what? 1-2 days of the 1 week offer (roughly, was like 5/6 days or something). 


What will happen?
We miss out of said sale because bugs? (Which is the champ, not just the skin as it occurs whenever thresh is in a game from what I've observed)
Does the sale get extended?
What's gonna happen?



EDIT: thanks for proving my down vote theory right too guys.

replies.body:
more like, you spend your money on this skin $20~~~~~

play 2 games....

DISABLED.

RITO I WANT TO BE REIMBURST

The sale on the Dark Star Thresh bundle will be extended until June 27th. There ought to be an official post up about it soon.

If you're getting downvoted, it might be because of stuff like this:
> because that's what this AIDS community does whenever I ask real questions.

rather than because of the question you are asking.

That's because trolls don't like to be called out.

Some one has to though, Riots not going to do anything about it, they're too busy getting each other off.

AIDS*

S stands for syndrome, not a plural of AID.

Yeah, i figured just after I hit enter, i was watching cartoons and mid game. 

I suck at multitasking :(
